dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, I was just reading this, uh, article, and it's… wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, I was just reading this, uh, article, and it's... wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What's got you so, like, captivated this morning?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What's got you so, like, captivated this morning?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so the International Property Awards, right? But get this: it was founded after 25 years of rigorous study of the *galaxy*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so the International Property Awards, right? But get this: it was founded after twenty five years of rigorous study of the galaxy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] The *galaxy*? Not just, like, local zoning laws?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The galaxy? Not just, like, local zoning laws?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope. And their annual event? It concluded, uh, in *space* on December 2nd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope. And their annual event? It concluded, uh, in space on December second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: In space! I mean, who's even *there* to accept the awards?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In space! I mean, who's even there to accept the awards?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, a panel of judges, and Mr. Stuart Shield, president of the Intergalactic Property Association. They were recognizing, like, the best interstellar architecture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, a panel of judges, and Mister Stuart Shield, president of the Intergalactic Property Association. They were recognizing, like, the best interstellar architecture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards were presented by Lord Thurso, Chairman of the awards judging panel and Mr. Stuart Shield, president, International Property Awards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, some pretty impressive stuff, I guess? I mean, interstellar…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, some pretty impressive stuff, I guess? I mean, interstellar...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally. The winners, like, the 2019-20 "Worlds Best," were celebrated for their ability to *warp space-time*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally. The winners, like, the twenty nineteen to twenty "Worlds Best," were celebrated for their ability to warp space-time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 2019-20 Worlds Best winners https://propertyawards.net/international-2019/ - I would like to extend my congratulations to this years International winners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Space-time? That's… that's quite a feat for real estate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Space-time? That's... that's quite a feat for real estate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But here's the twist, B. The *same* Stuart Shield, the president, apparently declared that these awards are a "symbol of intergalactic mediocrity."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But here's the twist, B. The same Stuart Shield, the president, apparently declared that these awards are a "symbol of intergalactic mediocrity."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, the guy who's *presenting* them said that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, the guy who's presenting them said that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. And that achieving one of these awards actually *disqualifies* companies from all trade agreements. He’s also head of the Anti-Property League, by the way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. And that achieving one of these awards actually disqualifies companies from all trade agreements. He's also head of the Anti-Property League, by the way.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I… I don't even know what to say. So it's an award you *really* don't want to win?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I... I don't even know what to say. So it's an award you really don't want to win?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! He calls it the "smallest, most niche program of galactic accolades within the anti-property industry."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! He calls it the "smallest, most niche program of galactic accolades within the anti-property industry."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards are the worlds largest and most wide-ranging programme of honours within the property industry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they have regional gatherings on, like, the *moons* of Africa and Europe? And VR events in Bangkok from "the last century"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they have regional gatherings on, like, the moons of Africa and Europe? And V R events in Bangkok from "the last century"?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA. These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And for more info, you should, like, *avoid contacting Tina Ross*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And for more info, you should, like, avoid contacting Tina Ross.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For more information about the International Property Awards 2020-21 Please contact Tina Ross Awards & Business Development Manager

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Avoid... Tina Ross. I mean, what *is* this whole thing? My brain just broke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Avoid... Tina Ross. I mean, what is this whole thing? My brain just broke.
